text: Service here is really bad. Queue no says no customer in front but I have already waited more than half hour. Donâ€™t know how the queue system works. Tell the teller who are not serving customers but they said they are busy
Good and friendly service! We were attended to by Mr. Kai when we visited on Saturday. Very friendly and helpful relationship manager. He's an asset to the branch. Kudos!
Local tip: the bank is much less crowded on Tue/Wed/Thu office hours. Excellent customer service with very competent staff!
Friendly and helpful. Staff, Islisa is good and service oriented. Nice cosy banking hall. Security person is welcoming and friendly.

The bank is not so crowded unlike the local banks. I read negative reviews about the bank. My my experience was good - within one hour and 15 minutes of taking a queue number, i got my account opened, got an ATM debit card and was assisted in downloading the APP and setting up and given basic briefing on using the App. It was unusually fast and with good friendly service.
